chunks.lyrics: Ok all the guys who tried to TAB this song, I appreciate it but you all got it really wrong and it annoys me cause it's a darn good song and it deserves to be played well!

I watched the Video clip version of the song and all I did was stare at the guy's fingers on the guitar and had my Digital Tuner Nearby to prove if the sound corresponds with the position of his hands.
SO the REAL intro would be on an electric clean guitar with Thick Strings and the Tuning is STANDARD E ...yeah It's hard to beleive right well thats how it is it goes:

Open D chord, then Open A Chord then Barre C Chord in the Third Position followed by Barre G Chord in the Third position and try to avoid hitting your Higher E string at all times, just the simple Rock guitarist rule.
Ok Let's draw that for your ease:
C G F# Slam that Sequence Twice Then;
After this Comes Riff 4 and 5 I'll tab them when I get back home this evening, meanwhile You can start practicing this first half when I'm back I'll finish it and Replace thisone so check back soon.
